about_the_game:
Experience the power of the NS SD60E - 6963 GoRail!

Features of the NS SD60E - 6963 GoRail include:

Brand new Custom Cab and in-cab Signals!
Fan Animation
Ditch Lights
Night Lighting
Surveyor Tip: To create your own custom session in Surveyor using your new locomotive. Locate the NS SD60E - 6963 GoRail by selecting the 'Train' Tab and searching for 'NS SD60E'.
detailed_description:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
